https://tmrev.io/movie/411677-Austerlitz 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eL8MGS4um840v28PApJkzxqkFZi.jpg The new film from Sergei Loznitsa (Maidan, The Event) is a stark yet rich and complex portrait of tourists visiting the grounds of former Nazi extermination camps, and a sometimes sardonic study of the relationship (or the clash) between contemporary culture and the sanctity of the site. Austerlitz
